Now that Plintissa had no more friends she activated her comm.

"All People's Group, these Maximals are ingrates and everyone takes their
side, let's go back to base." Plintissa ordered. Radistor stepped across the
field and started to go back to base, picking up the 5 members of the
People's group that he wasn't already carrying, he walked across the
field...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Iron Raptor" <ironraptor13@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 8:00 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
>
> * Iron Raptor looked at Prowl as he came to stand beside her for support,
his concerned question still hanging in the air.
> She was more tired then wounded and all she wanted to do was collapse and
sleep, the strain from keeping her Second Beast Mode active was what was
causing it.
> With a rather tired look she glanced over at Plintissa but then she turned
away from her, being the enemy now she wanted nothing to do with her.
> Iron Raptor then looked back at Prowl, the concern in his optics still
very visible.*
>
> " I'm alright just...so tired."
>
> * Her last words were a bit weak as she then looked ahead of her but then
closed her optics for a few moments to rest them but then reopened them, a
sudden spasm in her side causing her to gasp but then contain herself as not
to worry Prowl any further.
> Her steps were still faltered but they carried her slowly towards a CR
chamber, although she needed rest more then a repair.
> The more she thought about sleep the more tired she became, her wounds
could be easily bandaged so that her wounds would not get worse as she
slept.
> Iron Raptor then leaned against a wall only a few feet from a CR chamber
but she didn't take another step towards it, obviously exhausted from the
battle as her breathing became a bit heavy but then slowed as her body
relaxed against the wall a bit.*
>
>
